Most commercially available CTIs software application limited impact , lack theory-driven material empiricism . The propose CTI support 30 year scientific evidence , use Transtheoretical Model Behavior Change ( TTM ) theoretical basis generate personalize intervention ( Prochaska & Velicer , 1997 ; Velicer , Prochaska , & Redding , 2006 ) . The TTM ideally suit resistant change unlikely take action near future , well prone relapse . The intervention primarily target negative coping strategy confound exacerbate Post-Traumatic Stress symptom hinder progress toward remission . Progress Transtheoretical Model Behavior Change ( TTM ) conceptual framework may define movement one TTM stage change next level change process , rather elimination significant reduction smoking , depression , stress per se . The CTI system modify project empirically test validated general population demonstrate significant outcome three propose module â€” smoke cessation , depression prevention , stress management . The CTI system provide intervention emphasizes advancement process change one 's pace focus project , rather linear progression structure behavior change program achieve change undesired behavior . DOC.criteria: Military Veterans , Operation Iraqi Freedom ( OIF ) /Operation Enduring Freedom ( OEF ) service prefer 18 year old Ability read comprehend English Mild moderate PTSD symptom Cigarette smoking ( prefer ) Mild moderate depression ( prefer ) Difficulty manage stress Comfortable use computer access Internet Present psychosis , bipolar disorder , active substance use , cognitive impairment Severe depression suicidal ideation ( Patient Health Questionnaire9 ) ( PHQ9 > 19 ) Severe PTSD symptom ( PTSD Symptom Checklist ) ( PCLM > 73 )
